name: Life Trajectory Improvement
entries: At 11th level, you gain additional features based on your earlier selection.
Desperado. When you make an Insight or Perception check and fail, you can expend a use of MacGyverâ€™d to reroll the attempt.
Wanderer. You ignore the effects of non-magical difficult terrain, and you gain a swim and climb speed equal to your walking speed, and add Wisdom to your Initiative Rolls
Soldier. Allies within 15ft of you have advantage on save to resist being frightened.
Craftsman. You gain expertise in the Artisan Tool you selected at level 5 or Gunsmithing Tools.
